summary.para: Specifies the URL of a page that displays when a user experiences an error while navigating through the wizard extension pages.

param.name: pszErrorURL
param.para: The URL of the page to display.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the URL of the initial server-provided HTML page in a hosted wizard.

param.name: pszURL
param.para: The URL of the initial server-provided HTML page.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Extends the interface by exposing methods to set the wizard extension's initial URL, and a specific URL in case of an error.
